name: The Shadow Chase
description: The Shadow Chase takes place in Kilboney Park. You awaken in the midst of the forest, you come to your senses, and have no clue how you ended up in such a place with no memories of what happened beforehand. Galloping sounds begin to echo around you as the fog thickens. Before you realize what’s happening, a dark figure on a horse appears before you. The headless rider waves his whip at you and whispers; “It’s time for you to visit the land of the dead.” Use all the resources available to escape and save yourself.  Let the chase begin!
